snippet: Wondering how average recreational players would have approached the winning shot from the pine straw next to the 10th hole at Augusta National last week.
abstract: Wondering how average recreational players would have approached the winning shot from the pine straw next to the 10th hole at Augusta National last week.

headline.main: Mere Mortal's Approach to Shot That Won Masters
headline.print_headline: Everyman’s Approach to Shot That Won Masters
